verses.verse: Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou art <S%H3303>fair,<s%> my <S%H7474>love;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thou art <S%H3303>fair;<s%> thou hast <S%H3123>doves'<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H1157><s%> thy <S%H6777>locks:<s%> thy <S%H8181>hair<s%> is as a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H5795>goats,<s%> that <S%H7945>appear<s%> <S%H1570><s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

Thy <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of sheep that are even <S%H7094>shorn,<s%> which came <S%H7945>up<s%> <S%H5927><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H7367>washing;<s%> whereof every <S%H7945>one<s%> <S%H3605><s%> bear <S%H8382>twins,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> is <S%H7909>barren<s%> among them.

Thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> are like a <S%H2339>thread<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and thy <S%H4057>speech<s%> is <S%H5000>comely:<s%> thy <S%H7541>temples<s%> are like a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H1157><s%> thy <S%H6777>locks.<s%>

Thy <S%H6677>neck<s%> is like the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> for an <S%H8530>armory,<s%> <S%H5921>whereon<s%> there <S%H8518>hang<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4043>bucklers,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7982>shields<s%> of mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>
Thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are like <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H6646>roes<s%> that are <S%H8380>twins,<s%> which <S%H7462>feed<s%> among the <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>

Until <S%H5704><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7945>break,<s%> <S%H6315><s%> and the <S%H6752>shadows<s%> flee <S%H5127>away,<s%> I will <S%H1980>get<s%> me <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H3828>frankincense.<s%>
Thou art <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3303>fair,<s%> my <S%H7474>love;<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3971>spot<s%> in thee.

Come <S%H935><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me from <S%H4480>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H3844><s%> my <S%H3618>spouse,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me from <S%H4480>Lebanon:<s%> <S%H3844><s%> <S%H7789>look<s%> from the <S%H4480>top<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of <S%H549>Amana,<s%> from the <S%H4480>top<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of <S%H8149>Shenir<s%> and <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> from the <S%H738>lions'<s%> <S%H4480>dens,<s%> <S%H4585><s%> from the <S%H4480>mountains<s%> <S%H2042><s%> of the <S%H5246>leopards.<s%>

Thou hast ravished my <S%H3823>heart,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>spouse;<s%> thou hast ravished my <S%H3823>heart<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> of thine <S%H4480>eyes,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6060>chain<s%> of thy <S%H4480>neck.<s%> <S%H6677><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> <S%H3302>fair<s%> is thy <S%H1730>love,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>spouse!<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> much <S%H2895>better<s%> is thy <S%H1730>love<s%> than <S%H4480>wine!<s%> <S%H3196><s%> and the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of thine <S%H8081>ointments<s%> than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1314>spices!<s%>

Thy <S%H8193>lips,<s%> O my <S%H3618>spouse,<s%> <S%H5197>drop<s%> as the <S%H5317>honeycomb:<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> are <S%H8478>under<s%> thy <S%H3956>tongue;<s%> and the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of thy <S%H8008>garments<s%> is like the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
A <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H5274>enclosed<s%> is my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>spouse;<s%> a <S%H1530>spring<s%> shut <S%H5274>up,<s%> a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> <S%H2856>sealed.<s%>

Spikenard <S%H5373><s%> and <S%H3750>saffron;<s%> <S%H7070>calamus<s%> and <S%H7076>cinnamon,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H3828>frankincense;<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H174>aloes,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> spices: <S%H1314><s%>

Awake, <S%H5782><s%> O <S%H6828>north<s%> wind; and <S%H935>come,<s%> thou <S%H8486>south;<s%> blow <S%H6315>upon<s%> my <S%H1588>garden,<s%> that the <S%H1314>spices<s%> thereof may flow <S%H5140>out.<s%> Let my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> his <S%H4022>pleasant<s%> <S%H6529>fruits.<s%>
